resources.string: This app provides two applications. 1) ZMQ remote control features for robots. It connects to the robot and listens to incoming remote control commands over ZMQ. In return, the video stream received from the robot is sent over ZMQ. To be used with the robot server (https://github.com/eggerdo/robot_server.node). 2) User interface to remote control a robot over ZMQ. Controls are sent over ZMQ to the robot server and video stream is received and displayed
